flawed_nl_solution:
The pens and pencils were $1 each so 2*1 = $<<2*1=2>>2
The back pack cost $15 and the pens/pencils cost $2 so 15+2 = $<<15+2=17>>17
His total spent was $32 and he has already spend $17 so 32-17 = $<<32-17=10>>10
That means he has $10 left to spend on 5 notebooks so the cost would be 10/5 = $<<10/5=2>>2 each

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
